introduction: 作品简介：在预备拍这个片子之前，我们想过各种历史与现实的素材，在争论与思考之中的时候才发现，不知道什么时候我们的环境和人都渐渐的变了，我们发现有些东西，不会被历史改变，不会被现实改变。“它”生活在被历史遗忘的夹缝里，“它”生长在被现实拥挤的落魄里。“它”不是我们个人的情感或者个人的意愿，“它”是客观的存在在我们的身边和历史的长河中。展映：草场地ING美术馆、宋庄PINK美术馆、银川青年戏剧节影像单元、中国青年舞蹈扶持计划。《长》类型：舞蹈影像导演/演员/编剧/：郑鹤松、丁路概念/舞蹈编导：郑鹤松拍摄：丁路剪辑/后期：罗煜昆（中国传媒大学）字幕：张子涵（中国传媒大学）作曲/编曲：Stephan Micus/刘子霄翻译：艾阔时长：14min28s字幕：中英文特此呜谢：丁宁、赵子岑"Long"Genre: Dance VideoDirector/Actor/Screenwriter/: Zheng Hesong, Ding LuConcept / Choreographer: Zheng HesongShooting: Ding LuEditing/post-production: Luo Yukun (Communication University of China)Subtitle: Zhang Zihan (Communication University of China)Composer/Arranger: Stephan Micus/Liu ZixiaoTranslation: Ai KuoDuration: 14min28sSubtitles: Chinese and EnglishHereby thank you: Ding Ning, Zhao ZicenIntroduction to the work: Before preparing to make this film, we thought about various historical and realistic materials, and only found out during the debate and thinking that our environment and people have gradually changed. We found that some Things will not be changed by history or reality. "It" lives in the crevice forgotten by history, and "it" grows in the abyss crowded by reality. "It" is not our personal emotion or personal will, "it" exists objectively around us and in the long river of history.Screenings: ING Art Museum in Caochangdi, PINK Art Museum in Songzhuang, Video Unit of Yinchuan Youth Theater Festival, Chinese Youth Dance Support Program.
